0.2.name: wordpress/make-clickable-tweet
0.2.description: In a recent project, I had a bunch of tweet content saved and needed a way to convert all URLs, hashtags, and user mentions into clickable links. I found that WordPress has a built-in function called make_clickable(), but it just works with plain URLs, so I took it one more step to make_clickable_tweet(). It's basically a regular expression wrapped in a simple function, but I figured someone else out there might need it.
